list: index 0 is this one, OR "spells.list" if you want to call it that :)

aquacut.name: AquaCut
aquacut.description: Inflicts severe damage on the water family

aquawall.name: AquaWall
aquawall.description: Creates a barrier that blocks an attack.

beastcut.name: BeastCut
beastcut.description: Inflicts severe damage on the beast family.

bedragon.name: BeDragon
bedragon.description: Transforms the user into a ferocious dragon.

berserker.name: Berserker
berserker.description: A powerful attack that leaves the user vulnerable.

biattack.name: BiAttack
biattack.description: A physical attack that strikes twice in succession.

bigtrip.name: BigTrip
bigtrip.description: Sweeps the legs out from under all enemies.

birdblow.name: BirdBlow
birdblow.description: Inflicts severe damage on the bird family.

bladed.name: BladeD
bladed.description: Protects the user and enables retaliation.

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.description: Attacks an enemy with a fireball.

blazeair.name: BlazeAir
blazeair.description: Inflicts damage with a blast of fire (all)

blazemore.name: Blazemore
blazemore.description: Attacks an enemy with a large fireball.

blazemost.name: BlazeMost
blazemost.description: A towering pillar of fire roasts an enemy.

blizzard.name: Blizzard
blizzard.description: A wicked blizzard howls through enemies (all)

boltslash.name: BoltSlash
boltslash.description: A sword attack made stronger by lightning.

boom.name: Boom
boom.description: A succession of explosions strikes enemies (all)

bugblow.name: BugBlow
bugblow.description: Inflicts severe damage on the bug family.

callhelp.name: CallHelp
callhelp.description: Summons friends who attack in droves.

chance.name: Chance
chance.description: There is no telling what may happen.

chargeup.name: ChargeUp
chargeup.description: Inflicts severe damage on the next turn.

cleancut.name: CleanCut
cleancut.description: Inflicts severe damage on the material family.

cover.name: Cover
cover.description: Takes all attacks meant for another monster.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description: Lays a curse on all enemies.

dechaos.name: DeChaos
dechaos.description: Clears confusion in all party monsters.

defence.name: Defence
defence.description: Lowers DEF of all enemy monsters.

demagic.name: DeMagic
demagic.description: Lifts the effects of all spells on enemies (all)

devilcut.name: DevilCut
devilcut.description: Inflicts severe damage on the devil family.

dodge.name: Dodge
dodge.description: Deflects any physical attack to another monster.

drakslash.name: DrakSlash
drakslash.description: Inflicts severe damage on the dragon family.

eagleeye.name: EagleEye
eagleeye.description: Determines the presence of items nearby.

eerielite.name: EerieLite
eerielite.description: Weakens all enemies to magic spells.

errand.name: Errand
errand.description: Makes the monster run an errand for 100G.

evilslash.name: EvilSlash
evilslash.description: A powerful but wildly aimed sword attack.

farewell.name: Farewell
farewell.description: Revives dead mates in exchange for own life (all)

fireair.name: FireAir
fireair.description: Inflicts damage with a breath of fire (all)

firebal.name: Firebal
firebal.description: Attacks enemies with a blast of fire (all)

firebane.name: Firebane
firebane.description: Attacks enemies with a wall of fire (all)

firebolt.name: FireBolt
firebolt.description: A huge wall of fire incinerates enemies (all)

focus.name: Focus
focus.description: Enables two moves in the next turn.

frigidair.name: FrigidAir
frigidair.description: Inflicts damage with a breath of ice (all)

geyser.name: Geyser
geyser.description: Opens a geyser to send an enemy flying.

guardian.name: Guardian
guardian.description: Takes all attacks meant for party monsters.

hellblast.name: HellBlast
hellblast.description: Strikes all enemies with huge lightning.

highjump.name: HighJump
highjump.description: The user leaps and attacks in the next turn.

hustle.name: Hustle
hustle.description: A dance that restores HP by 70 - 80 (all)

iceair.name: IceAir
iceair.description: Inflicts damage with a freezing breath (all)

icebolt.name: IceBolt
icebolt.description: Small chunks of ice hail down on enemies (all)

iceslash.name: IceSlash
iceslash.description: A sword attack made stronger by the power of ice.

icestorm.name: IceStorm
icestorm.description: Inflicts damage by exhaling a blizzard (all)

infermost.name: Infermost
infermost.description: A huge tornado roars through enemies (all)

informer.name: Informer
informer.description: Use to obtain information on monsters.

ironize.name: Ironize
ironize.description: Changes all party monsters into chunks of iron.

k.o.dance.name: K.O.Dance
k.o.dance.description: A dance that induces death in all enemies.

kamikaze.name: Kamikaze
kamikaze.description: Leaves the user and target on the verge of death.

legsweep.name: LegSweep
legsweep.description: Sweeps the leg out from under one enemy.

lifedance.name: LifeDance
lifedance.description: A sacrificial dance to revive dead friends.

lifesong.name: LifeSong
lifesong.description: Revives all dead friends in the next turn.

luredance.name: LureDance
luredance.description: A dance that makes all enemies want to join in.

lushlicks.name: LushLicks
lushlicks.description: Licks one enemy to stop it for one turn.

massacre.name: Massacre
massacre.description: Inflicts severe damage on one friend or foe.

metalcut.name: MetalCut
metalcut.description: Inflicts damage on a high DEF enemy.

mouthshut.name: MouthShut
mouthshut.description: Prevents all enemies from using breath attacks.

napattack.name: NapAttack
napattack.description: A physical attack that may put the target to sleep.

odddance.name: OddDance
odddance.description: A dance that reduces an enemy'S MP.

outside.name: Outside
outside.description: Instantly warps the party out from caves and towers.

palsyair.name: PalsyAir
palsyair.description: A breath that paralyzes all enemies.

panidance.name: PaniDance
panidance.description: A dance that confuses all enemies.

paralyze.name: Paralyze
paralyze.description: A physical attack that may paralyze the target.

pheromone.name: Pheromone
pheromone.description: Attracts enemy monsters of the opposite gender.

poisonair.name: PoisonAir
poisonair.description: A breath that badly poisons all enemies.

poisongas.name: PoisonGas
poisongas.description: A breath that poisons all enemies.

poisonhit.name: PoisonHit
poisonhit.description: A physical attack that may poison the target.

psycheup.name: PsycheUp
psycheup.description: Inflicts severe damage at the end of the turn.

quadhits.name: QuadHits
quadhits.description: A physical attack that strikes four times.

radiant.name: Radiant
radiant.description: A blast of light blinds all the enemies.

rainslash.name: RainSlash
rainslash.description: A sword attack that hits all enemies.

ramming.name: Ramming
ramming.description: A fullbody tackle that also hurts the user.

robdance.name: RobDance
robdance.description: A dance that steals an enemy'S MP.

sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
sacrifice.description: The user explodes to inflict damage on all enemies.

sandstorm.name: SandStorm
sandstorm.description: Obscures the visibility of all enemies.

scorching.name: Scorching
scorching.description: Inflicts damage with a huge blast of fire [all}

sealpray.name: SealPray
sealpray.description: Seals a skill used by the enemy.

shears.name: Shears
shears.description: Inflicts severe damage on the plant family.

sicklick.name: SickLick
sicklick.description: Licks one enemy to reduce its DEF.

sidestep.name: SideStep
sidestep.description: A quickfooted skill for dodging attacks.

sleepair.name: SleepAir
sleepair.description: A breath that induces sleep in all enemies.

slimeblow.name: SlimeBlow
slimeblow.description: Inflicts severe damage on the slime family.

slowall.name: SlowAll
slowall.description: Lowers AGL of all enemy monsters.

squallhit.name: SquallHit
squallhit.description: A physical attack that hits first.

stepguard.name: StepGuard
stepguard.description: Protects the party from injurious terrain.

stopspell.name: StopSpell
stopspell.description: Prevents spell casting by all enemies.

stormwind.name: StormWind
stormwind.description: Bounces back all breath attacks to all enemies.

strongd.name: StrongD
strongd.description: Strongly protects the user against all attacks.

suckair.name: SuckAir
suckair.description: Holds in a breath to inflict severe damage next turn

suckall.name: SuckAll
suckall.description: Inhales all breath attacks meant for the party.

surge.name: Surge
surge.description: Eliminates all status problems among friends.

surround.name: Surround
surround.description: Surrounds all enemies in a mirage.

tailwind.name: TailWind
tailwind.description: Bounces back a breath attack to an enemy.

takemagic.name: TakeMagic
takemagic.description: Absorbs the MP of a spell cast against the user.

thickfog.name: ThickFog
thickfog.description: Creates a fog that prevents the use of all spells.

thordain.name: Thordain
thordain.description: Huge shards of lightning rip enemies (all)

tidalwave.name: Tidalwave
tidalwave.description: Summons a towering wall of water (all)

transform.name: Transform
transform.description: Transforms the user into a chosen enemy.

twinhits.name: TwinHits
twinhits.description: Doubles the ATK of one monster.

twinslash.name: TwinSlash
twinslash.description: Inflicts severe damage but also hurts the user.

vacuslash.name: VacuSlash
vacuslash.description: A sword attack enhanced by whirlwinds.

vacuum.name: Vacuum
vacuum.description: Creates a tornado with vicious winds (all)

warcry.name: WarCry
warcry.description: A terrifying cry that stops all enemies.

watershot.name: Watershot
watershot.description: Shoots a high volume of water at an enemy.

whiteair.name: WhiteAir
whiteair.description: Looses a white shining breath of ice (all)

windbeast.name: WindBeast
windbeast.description: Slashes a single monster with sharp whirlwinds.

yellhelp.name: YellHelp
yellhelp.description: Summons a mass of friends that attack in droves.

zap.name: Zap
zap.description: Powerful bolts of lightning lash enemies (all)

zombiecut.name: ZombieCut
zombiecut.description: Inflicts severe damage on the zombie family.
